participant_1.background:
I love to knit to relieve stress and keep my hands busy.
I have a system for doing laundry that works well for me.
i love dogs.
i am a ballet dancer.
I like to play video games and go for walks with my dog Percy.

participant_2.background:
I grew up on my family's farm and learned to love the land.
i try to eat a balanced diet.
My favorite people are the ones who can appreciate my cooking.
my favorite hobby is knitting.
I live in the Midwest with my family, but I like to spend time alone sometimes.

content.text: Hi there! How are you doing today?
I'm doing great! I'm just getting ready to start a knitting project.
That's awesome! I love to knit too. What are you making?
I'm making a pair of socks for my husband.
Oh, that's so sweet! I'm sure he'll love them.
I hope so! I'm trying out a new pattern, so I'm not sure how they're going to turn out.
I'm sure they'll be great! I'm always learning new knitting patterns too.
Me too! It's so much fun to try new things.
I know, right? It's so rewarding to finish a project and see how it turns out.
What's your favorite thing to knit?
I love knitting socks! They're so quick and easy to make, and they're always useful.
I know, right? I love knitting socks too.
It's so nice to meet someone else who loves knitting!
Me too! It's always fun to talk to someone who gets it.
I know, right? It's like a secret club or something.
